name: Brick House - Double Connecticut - Toro
additionalNotes: Handmade by J.C. Newman in Nicaragua, Brick House Double Connecticut cigars are adorned with a natural golden-brown wrapper over a superb blend of aged binder and filler tobaccos.  Flavors of sweet cedar, coffee, cream, toast, and subtle hints of spice, provide a very satisfying mellow to medium bodied experience. It’s an affordable line of premium handmade cigars with the outstanding construction and consistency you’ve come to expect from a J.C. Newman offering.
